medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports 3 days of severe right lower abdominal pain. The pain started periumbilical and then traveled to the right lower quadrant. For the past 24 hours, he also experienced nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea. He reports feeling generally unwell and had subjective fevers.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Gastroparesis, renal stones s/p ureteral stenting, history of childhood asthma
medical_history.family_history: Younger brother with frequent vomiting, father with unspecified condition
